mil7.5.8:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘gorupassa cattari angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani cattari angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.5.8:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, gorupo sakam geham na vijahati;
mil7.5.8:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sako kayo na vijahitabbo ‘aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanavikiranaviddhamsanadhammo ayam kayo’ti.
mil7.5.8:1.4: Idam, maharaja, gorupassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.8:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, gorupo adinnadhuro sukhadukkhena dhuram vahati;
mil7.5.8:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena adinnabrahmacariyena sukhadukkhena yava jivitapariyadana apanakotikam brahmacariyam caritabbam.
mil7.5.8:2.3: Idam, maharaja, gorupassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.8:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, gorupo chandena ghayamano paniyam pivati;
mil7.5.8:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena acariyupajjhayanam anusitthi chandena pemena pasadena ghayamanena patiggahetabba.
mil7.5.8:3.3: Idam, maharaja, gorupassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.8:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, gorupo yena kenaci vahiyamano vahati;
mil7.5.8:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena theranavamajjhimabhikkhunampi gihiupasakassapi ovadanusasani sirasa sampaticchitabba.
mil7.5.8:4.3: Idam, maharaja, gorupassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
